tool_description: Netflix unofficial API. Bringing all the data of the films, with various forms of search, including the rating on IMDB.
name: Netflix Unofficial
title: Netflix Unofficial

api_list.name: Genres
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netflix-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/api/genres"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netflix-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description:
Search for movies on Netflix with multiple filters. Take the capital letter into account.
The parameters we use are optional and are as follows:
- year: year of the film
- actors: actor or actor of the film
- genre: genre of the film
- director: film director
- rating: minimum IMDB rating
- time_min: minimum movie time
- time_max: maximum time of the film.
